meanings.sent1: I need to resurvey the land to make sure the boundaries are correct.
meanings.sent2: The team will resurvey the area next week to gather more data.
meanings.sent3: After getting lost, they had to resurvey the path to find their way back.
meanings.sent4: She decided to resurvey her priorities after the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent5: The scientist will resurvey the experiment to confirm the results.

meanings.definition: A second survey of an area or property
meanings.sent1: The resurvey of the land revealed new information about its history.
meanings.sent2: The resurvey conducted last month showed changes in the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The resurvey of the park led to the discovery of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The resurvey of the building highlighted areas that needed renovation.
meanings.sent5: The resurvey of the neighborhood provided valuable insights for urban planning.
